1.content: Kari Kamiya ran into the arms of her best friend (and to her hopefully her future boyfriend and husband) TK Takaishi but something felt different. Kari looked at TK and noticed something, tk had grown fat over the summer! how much?
1.title: how big?

info.brief_description: TK from digimon fattens up to make Kari happy
info.description: tk gets fat over summer break and found out kari loves it! season two TK and kari please fattening up to immobility is allowed and DEFINITELY encouraged! anything goes except slob
